properties.address: Emmanuel Free Church Of England, Lancashire LA4 5AJ
properties.description: We are a community hub, with a store, charity shop and free community cafe open every Fri. Why not also come along to our service at 10am every Sunday. We also have a kids play area and we enjoy fellowship together after the service with tea, coffee and cake. Come and join our community!
properties.title: Emmanuel Church

properties.description: Our libraries in Lancashire are all warm, safe and welcome spaces. You don't need to be a member of the library to visit our space. Joining the library is free if you want to be a member and borrow books, access our free book, audio, newspaper and magazine download services.
properties.title: Heysham Library

properties.description: Our libraries in Lancashire are all warm, safe and welcome spaces. You don't need to be a member of the library to visit our space. Joining the library is free if you want to be a member and borrow books, access our free book, audio, newspaper and magazine download services.
properties.title: Morecambe Library

properties.address: St. Marys Presbytery, Morecambe, Lancashire LA4 5JR
properties.description: We offer a warm meal, dessert and brews for anyone in need of a welcoming space to come and socialise with others in the community.
properties.title: Parish of St John Henry Newman, Morecambe - Warm Welcome

properties.address: Sefton Road United Reformed Church, Morecambe, Lancashire LA3 1TZ
properties.description: Our church hall is open every Tuesday, 12pm to 2pm (April to November) and 10am to 3pm (December to March). We offer free hot drinks, soup and toast, newspapers, board games, free wifi, table tennis and pool table, a small library, and a warm, welcoming space to sit or chat.
properties.title: Sefton Road United Reformed Church

properties.address: Stanley Road Baptist Church, Lancashire, Lancashire LA3 1UP
properties.description: Our welcoming church foyer space is open every Wednesday from 10am until 1pm with warm snacks, hot drinks and a soup lunch. We have free wifi available, jigsaws and games. We also have trained listeners, if you would like a chat.
properties.title: Stanley Road Baptist Church

properties.address: St. Marys Presbytery, Morecambe, Lancashire LA4 5JR
properties.description: This space is open to anyone who would benefit. We offer a hot meal and brews on a Wednesday between 12.00 and 2.00 p.m. in the Parish Hall at St Mary's.
properties.title: Warm Welcome - Parish of St John Henry Newman

properties.description: we provide support to the LGBT+ Community in the Lancaster District

properties.address: VODAFONE, 12, ROYALTY MALL, ARNDALE CENTRE, MORECAMBE, LANCASHIRE, LA4 5DH
properties.description: The Bay is a Nature and Wellbeing Programme, offering people around Morecambe Bay the opportunity to get outdoors and connect with nature. Our community Hub is open once a week with a mixture of food shares (redistributing food waste) and activities.
properties.title: The Bay: A Blueprint for Recovery
